titleStmt.title: Act, for inbringing of His Majesties excise and supply. Edinburgh, the twenty fourth day of December, 1688.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, city, and university,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Col. McKenzie, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: his most sacred Majesty, city, and university
